title: Van der Poel, Ganna, Pidcock Denied By Italian Outsider in Tirreno-Adriatico Misery-Fest
content:
Pre-stage favorites outsprinted after wild final of filthy-wet, 240km trek across Italy; Ganna rubberstamps San Remo potential with climbing, pursuiting prowess.

Read the full article at Van der Poel, Ganna, Pidcock Denied By Italian Outsider in Tirreno-Adriatico Misery-Fest on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
